commit.message:
Fix issue with some std::unordered_map implementations

We currently don't adhere to the restriction that if two
items are equal to each other, their hashes must be the
same too. This comes from the issue that unitless numbers
compare equal to the same number even if they have units.
Regenerate source includes for MSVC
Add headers and includes to Makfile.conf

Add utility perl script to generate MSVC source list

This makes it obsolete to keep MSVC files in sync manually
whenever we add, remove or rename a source file.

commit.message: Fix abspath handling on windows without directory

Fix an interesting memory handling edge case

Fixes https://github.com/sass/libsass/issues/3078

It seems the ternary is returning the type of the second argument.
This means that the first one was first upgraded to a shared object,
and once assigned to a normal pointer, it got prematurely collected.

Add back C-API getters for plugin paths

They are probably not really useful, but we already
have them documented in the context API documentation.
Fix misleading compiler warning

Ensure correct output order of compound selectors

Fixes https://github.com/sass/libsass/issues/3084

commit.message:
Add new libsass spec repository to CI test

https://github.com/mgreter/libsass-spec

Change "sanctioned" to "approved" (#3011)

* Change "sanctioned" to "approved"

Clarify the meaning of the list in the Readme.md.

* Change "Approved" to "Supported"

Suggestion from #3011.

There are other options in the comments still. I'm not really sure how to come to consensus in an open source project on a qualitative change like this.

Change "sanctioned" to "approved" (#3011)

* Change "sanctioned" to "approved"

Clarify the meaning of the list in the Readme.md.

* Change "Approved" to "Supported"

Suggestion from #3011.

There are other options in the comments still. I'm not really sure how to come to consensus in an open source project on a qualitative change like this.
